item.title: Robust Semantic Place Recognition with Vocabulary Tree and Landmark Detection
item.description: This is my main project when I was working on Robotics at Purdue ECE. Place recognition with image time series, published at ASP-AVS-11 workshop. Paper | Slides | Video | BibTeX
